name: Procedural Ant Colony (Extremely Unoptimized)
description:
Controls - Change Slider Values and buttons

Use middle mouse to pan and zoom in to take a closer look at the ant farm

While in ant mode, click to drop food for the ants. 

This game was made for APG CW 1

Assets used - https://opengameart.org/content/walking-ant-with-parts-and-rigged-spriter-file
